 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁפוֺת‎</span> ([[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>ii. 1. 186</sup>) **noun feminine** dubious, perhaps ==cream== (as ***skimmed of ?*** compare [[BDB#Wetzst|Wetzst]]<sup>ZAW iii (1883), 276 f.</sup>, who connects with Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***cream***, and this with √<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***take off the top*** (but <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> = <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ?); EV ***cheese*** (after [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]], compare [[BDB#Kennedy|ARSK]]<sup>KB 3091</sup>)); — construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁפוֺת בָּקָר‎</span> [[2Sam.17.29|2Sam 17:29]] ***cream of the herd*** ( + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דְּבַשׁ וְחֶמְאָה וְצאֹן‎</span>), compare [[BDB#Now|Now]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]]; [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]. of Lucian [[BDB#HPS|HPS]] ***calves***.
